Summary: star like object got my attention while sitting on my back deck. I have 20/15 vision and was raised around military aircraft my entire life - know the difference. No aircraft lights - heading east - accelerated out of view - deffinitely strange.
divs: Sighting Detailsthat's about it - wife was with me - possible military craft - but strange - no sonic boom - I'm capable of estimating speed - not sure due to "star" like observation - I think it was subsonic until it accelerated out of view (acceleration speed 2000 mph+ best guess)
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around June 21st 2012
